title: Saffire - 1994 - Old, New, Borrowed & Blue FLAC
description:
Saffire - 1994 - Old, New, Borrowed & Blue

Old, New, Borrowed & Blue finds Saffire's sound bordering on the formulaic. Songs like "Bitch with a Bad Attitude" and "There's Lighting in These Thunder Thighs" are simply too cutesy and too predictable -- but there is still plenty for their fans to treasure on the record. (AllMusic)

Track list:
01 - Fools' Night Out
02 - T'aint Nobody's Business
03 - You Got To Know How
04 - Do Your Duty
05 - Roll Mr. Jelly
06 - The Clock
07 - The Richest Guy In The Graveyard
08 - Don't You Tell Me
09 - Bitch With A Bad Attitude
10 - Sweet Substitute
11 - Baby, I'm Wise
12 - Falling Back In Love With You
13 - There's Lightning In These Thunder Thighs
14 - How Can I Say I Miss You
15 - Life Goes On
16 - Yonder Come The Blues

Personnel:
Andra Faye McIntosh - vocals, guitar, acoustic guitar, mandolin, fiddle, bagpipe, acoustic bass
Ann Rabson - vocals, guitar, acoustic guitar, piano
Gaye Adegbalola - vocals, guitar, harmonica

Enjoy and share!
